mapper.insert: insert into document (doc_name, doc_url, doc_description, doc_uploader, doc_group) values (#{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docUploader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{docGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER})

doc_name,
doc_url,
doc_description,
doc_uploader,
doc_group,
